医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
机器学习工具利用 MRI 脑部扫描预测精神病的发作使用机器学习工具可以在精神病发作之前进行预测，该工具可以将 MRI 脑部扫描分为健康人群和有精神病发作风险的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Machine-learning-tool-predicts-onset-of-psychosis-using-MRI-brain-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Machine-learning-tool-predicts-onset-of-psychosis-using-MRI-brain-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54648e5a-b83e-4cc5-8962-379657805e7d Tue, 13 Feb 2024 11:17:42 -0500 Machine-learning tool predicts onset of psychosis using MRI brain scans
与财富相关的不平等对五岁以下儿童营养不良的影响《科学报告》中的一项新研究对这一领域进行了研究，探讨了两者在低收入和中等收入国家 (LMIC) 中的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/The-effect-of-wealth-lated-inequality-on-undernutrition-in-children-under- Five.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/The-effect-of-wealth-lated-inequality-on-undernutrition-in-children-under- Five.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6229c08b-38dd-4036-8f95-0da519ea9cd6 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 09:46:00 -0500 The effect of wealth-related inequality on undernutrition in children under five
童年欺凌造成的人际不信任与青少年的心理健康问题有关加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心和格拉斯哥大学共同领导的一项新研究发现，由于童年欺凌而对其他人产生强烈不信任的青少年，与其他青少年相比，在进入成年后出现严重心理健康问题的可能性要大得多。那些没有出现人际信任问题的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Interpersonal-distrust-from-childhood-bullying-linked-to-mental-health-problems-in-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Interpersonal-distrust-from-childhood-bullying-linked-to-mental-health-problems-in-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d949b5b1-f756-477f-b07f-c9685c9748c9 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:54:42 -0500 Interpersonal distrust from childhood bullying linked to mental health problems in teens
联合疗法为非小细胞肺癌治疗带来突破德克萨斯大学MD安德森癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，靶向治疗和免疫治疗的特定组合可以更好地帮助非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）患者克服固有的免疫抵抗并重振抗肿瘤活性中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Biomarker-Directed-Combination-Effective-In-Immunotherapy-Resistant-Lung-Cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Biomarker-Directed-Combination-Effective-In-Immunotherapy-Resistant-Lung-Cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da4a4e14-65da-4d54-aeac-b0908f605853 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:44:00 -0500 Combination therapy offers breakthrough in NSCLC treatment
植物性饮食可减少前列腺癌患者的勃起功能障碍和尿失禁一项新的研究显示，限制肉类和奶制品但富含水果、蔬菜、谷物和坚果的饮食可以减少前列腺癌患者的勃起功能障碍、尿失禁和其他常见副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Plant-based-diet-linked-to-less-erectile-dysfunction-urinary-incontinence-in-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Plant-based-diet-linked-to-less-erectile-dysfunction-urinary-incontinence-in-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00f6b005-61e9-474d-9220-3cea816f72a9 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:35:07 -0500 Plant-based diet linked to less erectile dysfunction, urinary incontinence in prostate cancer patients
“落后于时代”：华盛顿试图赶上人工智能在医疗保健领域的应用华盛顿的立法者和监管机构开始困惑如何监管医疗保健领域的人工智能——人工智能行业认为他们很可能会把事情搞砸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/e28098Behind-the-timese28099-Washington-tries-to-catch-up-with-AIe28099s-use-in-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/e28098Behind-the-timese28099-Washington-tries-to-catch-up-with-AIe28099s-use-in-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1351bd4-4aa1-461c-8da9-39b7eaf66816 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:24:54 -0500 ‘Behind the times’: Washington tries to catch up with AI’s use in health care
在医疗保险支付之争中，医院游说团体展现了实力在控制医疗费用的斗争中，医院正在运用政治力量来保护自己的底线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/In-fight-over-Medicare- payments-the-hospital-lobby-shows-its-strength.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/In-fight-over-Medicare- payments-the-hospital-lobby-shows-its-strength.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab02bc1a-aa8a-4789-9f2c-9283a2d22553 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:23:17 -0500 In fight over Medicare payments, the hospital lobby shows its strength
血浆中的蛋白质组生物标志物作为健康个体痴呆症的预测因子血浆蛋白质组谱对无痴呆成人未来痴呆发作的预测能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Proteomic-biomarkers-in-blood-plasma-as-predictors-of-dementia-in-healthy-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Proteomic-biomarkers-in-blood-plasma-as-predictors-of-dementia-in-healthy-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29f40daf-10d6-4946-8d02-79df4b7bc825 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 04:44:00 -0500 Proteomic biomarkers in blood plasma as predictors of dementia in healthy individuals
研究发现，支持性养育和屏幕时间将母亲抑郁与儿童自我控制联系起来母亲抑郁症与行为自我调节之间的潜在关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Supportive-parenting-and-screen-time-link-maternal-depression-to-child-self-control-research-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Supportive-parenting-and-screen-time-link-maternal-depression-to-child-self-control-research-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d234585-8319-4a0b-912d-331e0911ab74 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 04:35:00 -0500 Supportive parenting and screen time link maternal depression to child self-control, research finds
研究表明，利托那韦增强的 nirmatrelvir 在美国对新的 omicron 变种仍然有效利托那韦增强型 nirmatrelvir (NMV-r) 对 Omicron 变体的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-shows-ritonavir-boosted-nirmatrelvir-remains- effective-against-new-omicron-variants-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-shows-ritonavir-boosted-nirmatrelvir-remains- effective-against-new-omicron-variants-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=587cc55e-46c2-4fc4-a30e-02946621bce3 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 04:05:00 -0500 Study shows ritonavir-boosted nirmatrelvir remains effective against new omicron variants in the U.S
